Key Match Events: Match abandoned due to rain after Scotland innings
Revised target for England was 109 in 10 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland won the toss and opted to bat
Captain Richie Berrington emphasized the importance of adapting to changing conditions
Captain Jos Buttler expressed delight in having Jofra Archer back and mentioned going with an extra pacer
England and Scotland have never faced each other in a T20I before this match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play multiple times, leading to the match being abandoned
The match was played at Kensington Oval, Barbados
